transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Abdul sir very good morning. Sorry very good evening sir.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Ji sir aapne abhi mail par feedback diya hai na usi ke regarding maine call kiya tha sir aapko.
Customer: Haan madam kya hai madam? 
Executive: Haan sir iske liye dekhiye na.
Customer: Agar discuss nahi karenge to uska problem resolve nahi hogi na aapki.
Executive: Isi ke liye maine call matlab mai aapko connect kar rahi hu.
Customer: Kya problem madam mujhe nahi chahiye Karnataka chahiye sirf Goa chahiye bolo.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai aapko sirf aur sirf Karnataka aur Goa ki list chahiye correct?
Customer: Jab is time pe bhi wohi jab profile banate us time pe bhi 100 baar bola woh bola yahi hai Goa Karnataka hai bolke aate hai Kashmir Uttar Pradesh udhar idhar woh kya hai.
Executive: Problem madam mujhe.
Executive: Sir dekhiye abhi jo system hai na pura mai aapko bata deti hu. Yaha pe sir abhi dekhiye pan India ki bhi lead aati hai aur hamari location ki bhi aati hai. Ab uske liye sir filter location filter option hai.
Customer: Ab jaise aapne mujhe bataya na Karnataka ki mai abhi dekh rahi hu sir 7.5 KVA diesel ki aayi thi diesel generator ki thik hai.
Executive: Usse pehle dekhiye woh Kolkata ka hai.
Executive: Haan usse pehle sir dekhiye na to ye kar sakte hai hum ki hume agar Karnataka aur Goa ki list chahiye na sir to iske liye hum particular sirf aur sirf apna Karnataka ka aur Goa ka agar filter apply karke list consume karenge woh hamare liye better hoga. Baki jis location me agar hum deal nahi kar rahe hai na sir to waha ki lead mat consume kariye aap.
Customer: Consume karta hi nahi lead jo mujhe irrelevant hai kyun chahiye.
Executive: Haan mai check kar sakti hu. Ek kaam kar sakte hai sir aapke location ki na jo bhi lead ke liye rahegi ek baar possible hoga agar aap meeting me aa jaye to mai sari cheeze aapko dikha ke yaha pe cheeze samjha saku. Baki mere end pe jo bhi rahega.
Customer: Bahut time lete hai madam.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir jyada time nahi dekhiye abhi sir IndiaMART sir online platform hai to thoda sa time lagta hai. Mai shuru se isliye hamari pehli baar video meeting me baat hui hai uske baad se sir aapne time hi nahi diya mujhe. Mai multiple time to apne end se sir aapko service ke liye connect kar hi rahi hu.
Customer: Achha thik hai thik hai madam I don't any explanation ispe baat kijiyega abhi kya karna hai setting isme.
Executive: Abhi ke liye thik hai mai bata rahi hu mai aapki register mail id par mai aapko link share kar rahi hu thik hai sir. Ab jo aapka reh gaya aapki product se related aur location se related aapko lead chahiye correct? To ye kaise milega woh cheeze mai usme aapko proper guide karungi.
Customer: Madam abhi mai setting me hu boliye kya karna hai.
Executive: Settings me hai sir aise ye hoga na screen me apni share karke aapko proper bata paungi.
Customer: Chalo madam thank you madam okay.
Executive: Hello
Customer: I don't madam okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants leads only from Karnataka and Goa.

- Expresses frustration with irrelevant leads.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the filter option for location.

- Suggested filtering leads by Karnataka and Goa.

- Offered a video meeting to explain settings.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share a link to registered email.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location, filter, karnataka, goa
